item.description:
*Harvard Biotech Club Annual Career Fair 2011*

Thursday, September 29th, 2011 (Next Week!)

1:00-5:00PM

New Research Building (3rd floor Rotunda), Harvard Medical School

The Harvard Biotech Club invites you to the biggest career event for life
science PhDs, MDs and postdocs. The biomedical industry is hiring heavily
this year and companies are hungry for talented Harvard students and
postdocs. These companies include leading organizations in Biotech (Vertex),
Consulting (BCG, Campbell Alliance, Health Advances, LEK Consulting), Patent
Law (Clark & Elbing, Finnegan, Hamilton Brook Smith Reynolds),
Pharmaceuticals (Pfizer), Publishing (Nature), and many more coming up.
Various companies will also be giving corporate presentations during the
Career Fair.

Join us at the Career Fair to network with company representatives, and land
the perfect job!


Registration is free for Harvard students and Harvard-affiliated
postdoctoral fellows, $20 for non-Harvard students, and $40 for
professionals. Please pay by by cash or check on-site. For more info, please
visit : http://www.thebiotechclub.org/careerfair/
item.name: Harvard Biotech Club Annual Career Fair 2011
